message: Let's be fair, Bob. This offer leaves us both with a decent amount.
Let's split things a bit more evenly, Alice.  Remember, time is money - literally!
I understand time is money Bob, but so is fairness. This offer is better than your last.
Alice, let's stop wasting time. A 50/50 split is the fairest and quickest way to settle this.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. I'm losing money with every round we waste. Accept this fair offer and let's be done.
Alice, I'm offering a slight improvement for you. Let's end this now before we both lose out more.
Bob, this is my final offer. It's a better deal than you've offered so far.  Take it or leave it.
